Text: Nice! BCC in HD and quick after race. Keep em coming this season. Thanks!

Nice! 

If only I could find the moto2 and moto3 downloads :/
Looking forward to see it. Thanks!!!
I'd never be able to see these without you... Many many thanks

Thank for the quick upload smcgill1969. Could you verify if this is an upscaled iPlayer stream capture like your earlier upload Motogp.20130421.USA.Race.720p.mp4 ?
"***NB: Due to channel swapping by the BBC I did not manage to record this from a satelite broadcast, rather from the iPlayer service - There was no HD broadcast so this has been upscaled, it's OK to watch though... ***"
sorry, did not mean to sound like a prissy, just wanted to confirm if it was an HDTV or iPlayer rip (which looks washed out on the 5 year old 64in plasma).
@geenotreally - No, it's a full on HD capture. For some reason the BBC seems to bump MotoGP in favour of other sports sometimes & this screwed up my series link for the USA race... :(
Thank you for the quick reply sir. I prefer beeb to OneTV.
